data.title: Famous Birthdays on September 4
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 4th of September. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on September 4.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 230

Al-Biruni, Iranian mathematician, astronomer and polymath, born in Kath, Khwarezm, Afrighid dynasty (d. 1048) [some sources cite 5th as birth date]
